Chariqa\' jun kemwiqb\'al le kkowinik kujaq kemwiqb\'al Man k\'o ta jun chi kech taq kojkemchak pa le awiqkemchakub\'al kkowinik kujaq we kemwiqb\'al, utz kaya\' kan %1$s chech utzukuxik %2$s jun kojkemchak le kkowinik. ¿Kawaj katel pa Nik\'ob\'al rech echeb\'alil? %1$s k\'isom Ujaqik Ya‘om pa ramib‘al b‘e Man kriqitaj ta le kempatanel Utz apetem pa %1$s Aninaq. Ke\'uchupisaj konojel taq kukis, wene kkitz\'apij kemchak on kkelesaj upam taq kare\'t rech loq\'oj. %1$s wene kkitij uq\'ij retzelaxik pa utukelam taq tz\'onoj rech cookies.
